title: Nottingham attacks: Police face probe over killer's alleged assaults
description: A police force which was investigating alleged assaults by a triple killer weeks before the Nottingham attacks has referred itself to the watchdog. Barnaby Webber and Grace O'Malley-Kumar, both 19, were fatally stabbed on 13 June along with Ian Coates, 65. Valdo Calocane was given a hospital order for the killings on Thursday.
